ModMetaData.name: Infinite Turrets
ModMetaData.author: Knight
ModMetaData.description:
Version 1.3.6
<size=18><color=#3986B3>[Infinite Turrets]</color></size> Infinite turrets reverts all turrets back to how they used to be in B18 and below. Specifically, it disables the requirement of material 'refuelling' in the form of "barrel replacements". Turrets therefore no longer have a durability that wears down with each use.
<size=18><color=#3986B3>[Features]</color></size> A list of some popular and confirmed working mods: - Combat Extended - Vanilla turrets - More Vanilla Turrets - Sci-Fire-Power-Core - Extended Turrets - Rimsenal Security Pack - TE Turret Expansion - Rimhammer 40K - Weapon Tech - Vanilla Furniture Expanded - Security - [Probably every other turret mod...]
<size=18><color=#3986B3>[Load Order]</color></size> You MUST place this mod above any other turret mod. I highly suggest putting it close to the top of your load order. If you're using Combat Extended, you MUST place this mod below it.
<size=18><color=#3986B3>[Credits]</color></size> Knight: Code & XML ; Logo
